CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100, "Key Event/Task Details Captured","Missing: "&IF( LEN( Subject ) < 3,"Quality Subject Description, ","")&""&IF(LEN(WhoId)=0,"Contact/Lead Reference, ","")&""&IF(LEN(WhatId)=0,"Account/Opportunity Reference",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
